attributes.action: Protect the mentally ill from the many closures of extremely important rehabilitation units that act as a stepping stone from illness to the Mainstream under the new government guidelines..all for the wrong reasons in the case of a pioneering Unit in Nottingham that has been fulfilling Govt requirements for years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A 10 year old purpose built, Pioneering Rehabilitation Unit called.SPAN:Nottingham NG5 3FL.

Under the guise of following the new current government guidelines the 'powers that be' intend to dismantle the very successful organisation that does exactly what the Government want,gets very mentally ill back into Mainstream,at a pace their illnesses dictate.
 
Reason for dismantling.."costs too much for too few." (before a proper consultation has been completed.)
Not playing in a level playing field, as the Unit has cynically been wound down over the last two years..so any number crunching exercise is obviously NOT going to come out in support of SPAN.

This Unit cost £1 million to build in 1994 and the staff have invested ten years in making it work.
You can work the rest out-The Unit is set in a delightful environment/leafy suburb of Nottm.
Helen Drury JP

government_responses.details:
